title: Noxus VS Ionia
body: with the noxus vs ionia battle, ionia won and we were gifted with boots of lucidity. i asked around and heard that if Noxus won we would get a new dorans item. do you think we could ever see this item in game?

replies.body: It would've actually been a spellvamp item, but I still would like to see how the meta of lol would differ

I wonder what it would do, by the looks of how the game has changed it, may have been changed into a different item though it might have also stayed the same. I'm kinda curious myself now.

I would like another Ionia verses Noxus that's rigged so we get to see this item. ^_^
